attributes.action: Make it easier for migraine sufferers to claim PIP.
attributes.additional_details: Some migraine sufferers can deal with day to day tasks when they don't have an attack. Like me personally, I'm good on migraine free days but every 4 or 5 weeks I can barely function for 5 to 6 days due to an attack. I don't think we should have to prove so hard that we suffer.
attributes.background: I want the government to make some specified change to the eligibility criteria for PIP to reflect the impact that migraines can have on sufferers.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to change on the PIP criteria. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
